Extract the estimated variance parameters.

Source: R/getter_params.R
get_sigma.Rd

Returns a dataframe KxT with the estimated variance paramaters sigma_kt per clone k and dimension t.

Usage

get_sigma(x)

Arguments

x

a mvnmm object.

Value

dataframe of variance parameters.

Examples

get_sigma(x)
#>      cov_early.L2 cov_early.L1 cov_early.L4 cov_early.L3 cov_mid.L2 cov_mid.L1
